short_description.en: $1,500 rebate for a ducted air source heat pump. Must meet efficiency specifications.
$500 rebate for smart electric heat pump water heater. $400 for standard electric heat pump water heater.
Up to $2,200 rebate for a ductless air source heat pump. Range is between $100 and $2,200 depending on heat pump size, efficiency, and current system.
Up to $1,500 rebate for electric panel upgrade. Must upgrade your panel to a higher amperage.
$400 rebate for a 20-55 gallon heat pump water heater. Rebate not to exceed 50% of cost.
$90 rebate for a >55 gallon heat pump water heater. Rebate not to exceed 50% of cost.
$25 rebate for a heat pump clothes dryer in a single-family home.
$200 per ton rebate for a mini-split air source heat pump.
$25 rebate for an induction range.
$50 rebate for an all-in-one washer/dryer combo with ventless heat pump drying.
Up to $1,000 rebate for a ductless air source heat pump. Amount varies by unit size and efficiency. Rebates under $400 credited to customer account.
Up to $1,000 rebate for quality installation of an air source heat pump. Must use a registered contractor.
$3,000 rebate for attic insulation and air sealing. $3,000 rebate for wall insulation for Green Zone residents only. Must receive utility rebate.
$1,300 rebate for attic insulation and air sealing. $1,500 rebate for wall insulation. For all Minneapolis residents. Must receive utility rebate.
$500 rebate for a heat pump water heater. Must be ENERGY STAR certified.
$200 bonus rebate for a heat pump water heater. Green Zone residents qualify for a $1,500 rebate. Must be ENERGY STAR certified.
